Name: Honey Vodka Collins
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: STIR honey with vodka in base of shaker until honey dissolves. ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: The honey and lemon combo are reminiscent of a toddy but here served long and iced with cleansing vodka.
History: Also see Collins Cocktails - recipes & history .
